title: Hasee Toh Phasee
writer: Harshavardhan Kulkarni, Anurag Kashyap, Purva Naresh
short_cast: Sidharth Malhotra, Parineeti Chopra, Adah Sharma, Manoj Joshi, Madhuri Sanjeev, Sharat Saxena, Nina Kulkarni, Anil Mange
cast: Sidharth Malhotra, Parineeti Chopra, Adah Sharma, Manoj Joshi, Madhuri Sanjeev, Sharat Saxena, Nina Kulkarni, Anil Mange
genre: Romantic Comedies, Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Comedies, Dramas, Romantic Movies

desc: Nikhil is tasked with keeping his fiancée's troublemaking sister, Meeta, from ruining his wedding. But in the process, the two become inseparable.
